name: the Devil took it
description:
STEAL ALL THE ITEMS TO WIN!

THERE ARE 5 SPECIFIC ITEMS ON BUILDINGS YOU SHOULD STEAL THEM ALL AND SELL THEM BACK TO WIN!

MAKE HUMANS THINK THEY LOST THEM AND RETURN THEM WHEN THEY DID NOT EXPECT!

TO RETURN KEEP AN EYE ON THE CLOCK APPEARING ON THE CORNER OF THE BUILDING,

YOU SHOULD RETURN IT AFTER THEY FORGOT THEY LOST IT

EACH ITEM COULD BE SOLD TO SPECIFIC BUILDINGS, IT IS A LOGICAL RIAL AND ERROR, MORE ERRORS THAN 3 AND IT IS GAME OVER!

ALSO, THERE IS ONE ANGEL PATROLLING THROUGH THE BUILDINGS, IF YOU PATHS CROSS ON A BUILDING YOU ARE OUT! 

KEEP THOSE IN MIND AND ENJOY MAKING HUMANS TRICKED!
